text: idīga allāhanu nim'ma hoṇeyannu haguragoḷisuttāne – nim'malli daurbalyaviruvudannu avanu ballanu. Nim'malli nūru jana sahanaśīlariddare, avaru innūru mandiyannu sōlisuvaru mattu nim'malli sāvira janariddare avaru allāhana sam'matiyinda eraḍu sāvira mandiyannu sōlisuvaru. Allāhanu sahana śīlara jotegiddāne
